LANGUAGE.LABEL: Oops! The selected function is not currently available.
CREATE BILLING TOKENS: Click the "Process" button below to create billing token for new members.
CREATE PAYMENTS: Click the "Process" button below to create payments for members due to be billed on or before the date specified below.
PROCESS PAYMENTS: Click the "Process" button below to process payments with a submitted status.
LIST DECLINED TOKENS: Click the "Process" button below to view a list of members with declined tokens.
LIST DECLINED PAYMENTS: Click the "Process" button below to view a list of members with declined payments.
UPDATE DECLINED PAYMENTS: Click the "Process" button below to update declined payments with recently provided billing info.
VERIFY BONUS QUALIFIED MEMBERS: Click the "Process" button below to calculate all active members that are qualified to earn bonuses or that are "Qualify" locked after the date specified below.
CALCULATE BONUSES: Click the "Process" button below to calculate commissions and bonuses for all member payments in the specified date range below.
UNHIDE NEW BONUSES: Click the "Process" button below to display all hidden new commissions and bonuses.
CREATE PAYOUTS: Click the "Process" button below to create payouts for all unpaid bonuses up to the date specified below and totaling $40+ per member.

CREAT PAYMENT CREDITS: Click the "Process" button below to create payment credits for all members with bill dates due within the next 7 days that have sufficient earned bonuses that have not been paid yet.
VERIFY QUALIFIED BONUS CHECKS: Click the "Process" button below to calculate all active members that are qualified to receive a bonus check.

CREATE PAYOUT FILE: Click the "Process" button below to create payout files stored in the "Payouts" folder, for ACH transactions and paper check printing. Pending payouts will be processed up to the date specified below and totaling $40+ per member.
MARK PENDING PAYOUTS PAID: Click the "Process" button below to update the status of all pending payouts to paid, up to the date specified below.
UNHIDE NEW PAYOUTS: Click the "Process" button below to display all hidden new payouts.
RECALCULATE GROUP SALES VOLUME: Click the "Process" button below to recalculate all group sales volume and check for new promotions.

POST SALES SUMMARY: Click the "Process" button below to post the current personal and group sales volume for all active Resellers and Affiliates with personal sales volume. The sales summary will be posted with the date below.
LIST ORPHANED AFFILIATES: Click the "Process" button below to view a list of affiliates without active sponsors.
CREATE NEW eWALLETS: Click the "Process" button below to list all eWallets for all new active International affiliates to be imported into iPayout.
ASSIGN NEW eWALLETS: Click the "Process" button below to setup the Payout Method to eWallet for all new active International affiliates.
SET MEMBER ALERTS: Click the "Process" button below to set declined payment and no backup alerts for all members.
CLEANUP OLD DATA: Click the "Process" button below to delete incomplete enrollments and other old data.
